title: Arsenio Hall (Full Interview) | Colbert Classic
description:
Arsenio Hall joined Stephen Colbert for a fascinating and wide-ranging discussion encompassing stories about his relationship with Johnny Carson, the infamous moment when Bill Clinton played saxophone on "The Arsenio Hall Show," and the inside story of why he and Eddie Murphy finally created the "Coming To America" sequel fans have spent decades begging to see. You can find "Coming 2 America" now on Amazon Prime!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
